structure.unit: LEVY AND ASSESSMENT OF PROPERTY TAXES

law.history: Repealed 1949 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 14. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 136, sec. 1. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 35, sec. 1 -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4042a-8, 4072.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Advancement against compensation to county tax commissioner in county containing city of first or second class.
